name: copilot-read-image
description: A VS Code extension that provides GitHub Copilot with image reading capabilities through registered language model tools

languageModelTools.name: copilot-read-image_readImageFromPath
languageModelTools.description: Reads an image from a local file path and returns its metadata and content for analysis
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Use this tool to read an image file from a local path. It returns the image format, size, and raw data encoded as base64 for further analysis.

imagePath.description: Absolute or relative path to the image file

languageModelTools.name: copilot-read-image_imgFromBase64
languageModelTools.description: Decodes a base64-encoded image string and returns its metadata and content for analysis
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Use this tool when you have a base64-encoded image string and need to decode and analyse it. Provide the base64 data and optionally the MIME type.

mimeType.description: Optional MIME type of the image (e.g. image/png, image/jpeg)

languageModelTools.name: copilot-read-image_imgFromUrl
languageModelTools.description: Fetches an image from a URL and returns its metadata and content for analysis
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Use this tool to fetch and analyse an image from a remote URL. It downloads the image and returns its format, size, and content.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image to fetch
